help_modal.action_attack_altclick: Attack (when left click is set to open menu)
help_modal.ui_leaderboard_desc: Shows the top players of the game and their names, % owned land and gold.
help_modal.ui_control_desc: The control panel contains the following elements:
help_modal.ui_pop: Pop - The amount of units you have, your max population and the rate at which you gain them.
help_modal.ui_gold: Gold - The amount of gold you have and the rate at which you gain it.
help_modal.ui_troops_workers: Troops and Workers - The amount of allocated troops and workers. Troops are used to attack or defend against attacks. Workers are used to generate gold. You can adjust the number of troops and workers using the slider.
help_modal.ui_attack_ratio: Attack ratio - The amount of troops that will be used when you attack. You can adjust the attack ratio using the slider. Having more attacking troops than defending troops will make you lose fewer troops in the attack, while having less will increase the damage dealt to your attacking troops. The effect doesn't go beyond ratios of 2:1.
help_modal.ui_options_desc: The following elements can be found inside:
help_modal.option_pause: Pause/Unpause the game - Only available in single player mode.
help_modal.option_timer: Timer - Time passed since the start of the game.
help_modal.option_settings: Settings - Open the settings menu. Inside you can toggle the Alternate View, Dark Mode, Emojis and action on left click.
help_modal.radial_desc: Right clicking (or touch on mobile) opens the radial menu. From there you can:
help_modal.radial_boat: Send a boat to attack at the selected location (only available if you have access to water).
help_modal.info_enemy_desc: Contains information such for the selected player name, gold, troops, and if the player is a traitor.Traitor is a player who betrayed and attacked a player who was in an alliance with them. The icons below represent the following interactions:
help_modal.info_target: Place a target mark on the player, marking it for all allies, used to coordinate attacks.
help_modal.info_alliance: Send an alliance request to the player. Allies can share resources and troops, but can't attack each other.
help_modal.info_emoji: Send an emoji to the player.
help_modal.info_ally_desc: When you ally with a player, the following new icons become available:
help_modal.ally_betray: Betray your ally, ending the alliance. You will now have a permanent icon stuck next to your name, unless the other nation was a traitor themselves. Attacks against you will incur less losses for the attacker until the end of the game, bots are less likely to ally with you and players will think twice before doing so.
help_modal.ally_donate: Donate some of your troops to your ally. Used when they're low on troops and are being attacked, or when they need that extra power to crush an enemy.
help_modal.build_city_desc: Increases your max population. Useful when you can't expand your territory or you're about to hit your population limit.
help_modal.build_defense_desc: Increases defenses around nearby borders. Attacks from enemies are slower and have more casualties.
help_modal.build_port_desc: Automatically sends trade ships between ports of your country and other countries (except if you clicked "stop trade" on them or they clicked "stop trade on you"), giving gold to both sides. Allows building Battleships. Can only be built near water.
help_modal.build_warship_desc: Patrols in an area, capturing trade ships and destroying enemy Warships and Boats. Spawns from the nearest Port and patrols the area you first clicked to build it. You can control Warships by attack-clicking on them and then attack-clicking the new area you want them to move to.
help_modal.build_sam_desc: Has a 75% chance to intercept enemy missiles in its 100 pixel range. The SAM has a 7.5 second cooldown and cannot intercept MIRVs.
help_modal.build_atom_desc: Small explosive bomb that destroys territory, buildings, ships and boats. Spawns from the nearest Missile Silo and lands in the area you first clicked to build it.
help_modal.build_hydrogen_desc: Large explosive bomb. Spawns from the nearest Missile Silo and lands in the area you first clicked to build it.
help_modal.build_mirv_desc: The most powerful bomb in the game. Splits up into smaller bombs that will cover a huge range of territory. Only damages the player that you first clicked on to build it. Spawns from the nearest Missile Silo and lands in the area you first clicked to build it.
help_modal.icon_desc: Examples of some of the ingame icons you will encounter and what they mean:
help_modal.icon_crown: Crown - This is the number 1 player in the leaderboard
help_modal.icon_traitor: Crossed swords - Traitor. This player attacked an ally.
help_modal.icon_ally: Handshake - Ally. This player is your ally.

private_lobby.title: Join Private Lobby
private_lobby.not_found: Lobby not found. Please check the ID and try again.
private_lobby.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
private_lobby.joined_waiting: Joined successfully! Waiting for game to start...

username.too_short: Username must be at least {min} characters long.
username.invalid_chars: Username can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, underscores, and [square brackets].

game_starting_modal.title: Game is Starting...
game_starting_modal.desc: Preparing for the lobby to start. Please wait.
